item.title: Global Launch Free Rewards!
item.description:
New milestone unlocked!

In order to THANK YOU all for supporting the Squad Busters launch, we've added a new milestone to the pre-registration reward track!

If we reach 40M pre-registrations before May 29, this beautiful Deco will be available at launch, and claimable for only a month!

Remember, each new player counts as a new pre-registration. Tell your friends, and let's do this together!

Continue reading - Last Edit: April 26

To celebrate the global release of Squad Busters, unlock FREE and EXCLUSIVE rewards for each pre-registration milestone the community achieves!

HOW IT WORKS

We've got not just one, not two, but FOUR awesome milestones to unlock!

Well, maybe even one more - who knows? üò∂

The more pre-registrations on Google Play & the App Store, the more the rewards for everyone! The first milestone is at 1 million, and the next milestones will be revealed as we unlock the previous one!

These are the rewards:

  • 10000 Coins

  • El Tigre

  • Chests (Common, Rare, and Epic)

  • Exclusive Global Emote

Pretty cool, huh?

All the unlocked rewards will be available in the game after Global Launch, and will stay in the shop FOR A MONTH!

HOW CAN I CONTRIBUTE?

If you‚Äôre reading this, it means you‚Äôre playing Squad Busters, therefore won‚Äôt have the option to pre-register. But WORRY NOT: every single active player counts towards the progress!

Your mission starts here: Tell your friends, family, neighbors, and pets to pre-register for Squad Busters on Google Play or the App Store, follow the progress of the community effort on the reward tracker, and claim the rewards in ALL games as they unlock!

WAIT, ALL GAMES?

YES! Each milestone will also unlock rewards in all the other Supercell games:

  • Brawl Stars

  • Clash of Clans

  • Clash Royale

  • Boom Beach

  • Hay Day

Make sure to claim your rewards over there too, and be ready for Squad Busters Global Launch on May 29th!

  • Fixed an issue to ensure pre-registration emotes are delivered to Soft Launch players

We are aware of the issues related to the Pi√±ata Festival, and we are working on them. Thanks for the reports!

MAINTENANCE - MAY 21, 2024

  • Fix for future content showing up in the shop too early

  • Removed Ice World maps from Squad League

UPDATE - MAY 21, 2024 Squad Busters‚Äô first update is packed full of content and improvements for a Global Launch like no other! ULTRA EVOLUTIONS UNLEASHED Discover fantastic new looks and fabulous new abilities with Ultra Evolutions!

  • All characters can now evolve to Ultra form and add some swagger to your Squad

  • Check out all of the 27 new Ultra Evolutions in the Squad tab in the game.

COLLECT HAMMERS & CUSTOMIZE YOUR PLAZA

The Plaza Shop is open for business!

  • Buy tons of top shelf Plaza decorations from the Plaza Builder with Hammers!

  • Find Hammers in Battles, from rewards or in the Shop, and use them to build Plaza decorations!

NEW GEM PASS SEASON: MOONLIGHT MATCHUP

Get ready for a new Gem Pass season full of prizes, including the two newest MEGA Units:

  • MEGA Magical Shelly: Dazzle others with her sparkling looks and Magic Blastwand!

  • MEGA Kitsune Witch: Outfox foes with bountiful Skeleton hordes and a 3-bolt attack!

The MEGA BANK will also return this season, and no longer requires buying a Super Pass!

BALANCING UPDATES

Everyone has a place in Squad Busters, and every unique character deserves its space to shine. These updates aim to help all Squad building choices feel meaningful, and to help enable countless paths to victory!

Character balancing: Supply-focused units have improved abilities to better balance them with fighters

  • Chicken gives 1 additional Turbo Boot

  • Baby Greg chops trees slightly faster

  • Goblin gives more Coins when joining the Squad

  • Trader gives 1 additional Gem after collecting enough Coins

  • Mavis can now get Gems from Carrots in addition to Coins

Many characters have improved Health to help them last longer in fights, especially ranged units

  • +100 Health: Goblin, Chicken, Archer Queen, Witch, Shelly, Nita, Max

  • +150 Health: Bo, Colt, Wizard

  • +200 Health: Medic, Dynamike, Pam, Penny, Tank (on foot)

  • +500 Health: MEGA Dragon Chicken

Summoned unit balancing:

Witch Skeletons have consolidated strength to improve map readability and help unclog Portals

  • Witch Skeletons have much more Health, but slightly reduced maximum lifetime

  • Witches summon slightly slower, but all at once, to a maximum of 12 Skeletons at a time

  • Skeleton Spell deploys fewer Skeletons

Royale King Recruits have been drilled into shape to better guard their King

  • Royal Recruits have more damage and tons more Health

MEGA Unit balancing:

MEGA Units appear during matches less randomly, and more often when you need them (sometimes)

  • MEGA Units are now much less likely to appear for players with a high position or big Squad

    • Instead, they appear more often for Squads that have been diminished later in the match

    • Being close to getting busted and being in low position increases chances to find a MEGA

  • Fewer MEGA units will be offered during matches

    • MEGA Units will no longer appear until after 2:00 in the match

    • MEGA Units will no longer appear to Squads that already have a MEGA Unit

    • MEGA Units will no longer appear when using an Epic Key or Fusion Key

    • MEGA Units will no longer appear for a while after you refuse one from a Chest

  • MEGA units also no longer increase Chest cost, to not interfere with Squad building

Battle Mods balancing:

  • Tree Giants: now have a chance to drop The Log Spell

  • Royal Haunt: Royal Ghosts drop more loot to better reward Ghost hunters

  • Epic Overload: has been moved to Royal World

  • Super Gem Mine: has been moved to Desert World

Other balancing updates:

  • Turbo now recharges faster, so there's more running and less waiting

  • Monsters now drop more Coins later in the match, to help ease rebuilding Squads

  • Greg's Trees, Bea's Hives, and Tank's Tanks reappear faster to improve availability

  • Blue Powerup Boxes drop 1 extra Coin to enable faster match starts

  • Royal World maps spawn more Guards to help keep up the action

OTHER IMPROVEMENTS & FIXES

  • Keep an eye out for Chest Doublers in events and the Shop, and get 2x Reward Chest prizes!

  • Invite friends to play Squad Busters and earn Rewards for you and your friends!

    • Check out the new Referral tab in your Friends list!

  • Daily Deals can now be refreshed in the Shop for Coins

  • The Chest Ticket refresh timer now pauses instead of resets when filling up on Chest Tickets

  • Your Squad Next Battle has been updated to have much fewer locked characters per Battle for players before Squad League

  • Other performance improvements and bug fixes

UPCOMING EVENTS & CONTENT

Pi√±ata Festival

Collect Pi√±ata Sticks with friends and earn special Rewards!

  • Look for a giant Pi√±ata visiting you Plaza for your chance to collect Pi√±ata Sticks in Battles!

  • Collect enough Pi√±ata Sticks to open Pi√±atas full of Coins and items for your Battle Bag!

  • Add friends to your Pi√±ata hunt and make progress together!

Ice World

  • 3 New Characters and 4 new Mods!

Follow our Social Media channels and your favorite Squad Busters content creators to learn more about the upcoming content!¬†

SKINS ARE HERE üëï

  • Origami Barbarian King

  • Street Magic Wizard

  • Ninja Goblin

FREE Black Belt Chicken Skin!

Stay tuned for more information coming in July about the Community Event to unlock it!

JULY AND AUGUST GEM PASS üéüÔ∏è

IN JULY:

  • One Skin: Pool Party Hog Rider

IN AUGUST:

  • Two new MEGAs: Fast Food Tank Girl and Street Trader

NEW EVENTS COMING UP üóìÔ∏è

  • Unlock Bandit

Bandit is showing up in the Plaza with a challenge to collect lots of Gems. Impress her with your Gem collecting skills to unlock her for your Squad!

  • Bounty Hunt

Colt is showing up in the Plaza with bounties. Bust Colt‚Äôs most wanted Monsters and earn big Coin Rewards!

GAMEPLAY & BALANCE CHANGES üìù

After a massive launch, Squads find their groove and show their skills. A new round of balancing changes aims to keep action up, improve some underperformers, and make Battles more dynamic and rewarding!

Battle Mods ‚öîÔ∏è

  • Pi√±ata Party: Find Giant Pi√±atas full of Pi√±ata Sticks when a Pi√±ata Festival Event is active

  • Loot Surge: Find surges of Pi√±ata Sticks when a Pi√±ata Festival event is active

  • Ring Grab: Gem Rings are worth much more Gems, and only drop 1 at a time

Gameplay üïπÔ∏è

  • Maps now spawn many more Monsters as the Battle progresses, including extra Bosses

  • Rare and Epic Chests in Battle have reduced chances to offer Common Characters, to make it easier to make Rare and Epic Fusions later in the Battle

Characters and Monsters üëæ

  • Furnace Spells and Shrink Spells are now more likely to be found in Battle

  • Freeze Spells now have more effective slowdown, even when Turboing

  • Super Bosses from certain Battle Mods now drop more Hammers

Other improvements and fixes üîé

  • You can now earn Portal Energy just from playing from Battles

  • Single Chest Tickets now cost less Coins, and can be bought in larger stacks

  • Reward Chests now convert maxed out Characters into Portal Energy or XP, instead of being skipped

  • Chests no longer stop respawning in Battle if a Squad is busted while opening that Chest

  • Tombstones no longer block Tanks, Hives, and other Map items from spawning

  • Fixed swapping Spells with Classic Wizard would sometimes accidentally throw a Spell instead

  • Various improvements and fixes for spectating Battles

item.title: Squad League Reset and Rewards!
item.description:
The current Squad League season is coming to its end, and we‚Äôre very excited to announce that everyone in Squad League as of Monday, July 1st, at 07:00 UTC, will receive a Kimono Witch Skin for free! This means if you reach level 90 in the Squad Journey before Monday 07:00 UTC, you'll get the skin!

Additionally, the Top 3 players on the Global leaderboard will receive:

  • Top 1: 300,000 Coins

  • Top 2: 200,000 Coins

  • Top 3: 100,000 Coins

These rewards will be available in your shop for 30 days, so be sure to claim them!

What does the end of a season mean, and what should you expect?

With the introduction of a new World in the Squad Journey, the Squad League will move to the end of the track. Here are some important details:

  • Players currently in Squad League will remain at Squad Journey level 90.

  • Squad League will move to level 120.

  • Players will need to advance through the Squad Journey to re-enter the Squad League.

  • Players with maxed Characters will receive Portal Energy from Chests when acquiring duplicates.

    • Once in Squad League, XP will be given instead.

    • Other sources of Portal Energy: New Characters merges, Book achievements, and Battles (with a daily cap of 300 from Battles).

  • Trophies will be halved for everyone, with a maximum cap of 4000. For example, a player with 5000 trophies will be reset to 2500, while anyone with 8000 or more will be capped at 4000.

    • The reset is designed to make the Squad League leaderboards accessible to all players at the start of each new season.

  • Squad League level and Rank will not reset, meaning players will retain their current league (e.g., Silver) and continue from there once they re-enter the Squad League

Feedback and Future Plans

We've received a lot of feedback about Squad League, and although we don't currently have a reward system tied to trophies, we're definitely working on making it more exciting in the future. In the meantime, we hope this article clarifies things and that these temporary rewards make your efforts a bit more worthwhile! Thanks for your dedication! ü©∑

August Update - Patch Notes!
item.description:
MAINTENANCE & OPTIONAL UPDATE ‚öôÔ∏è

When? Wednesday, 21st

What are we fixing?

  • Units not attacking moles in Whack-A-Mole

    • The mod will be disabled for now and will return in the next update.

  • Missing text in several places

  • Pi√±ata Bank not always giving out rewards

    • Fixed in the optional update - Please, update your game!

  • Several crashes

  • Shop Refresh issues

LAVA WORLD IS HERE! üåã

The action is heating up in a blazing world packed with mighty Monsters and explosive gameplay!

Play during the Lava World Sneak Peak week to try Lava World and start unlocking new Characters! If you‚Äôve reached Desert World, all you have to do is collect Pancakes in Battles for the hungry Mini P.E.K.K.A in your Plaza and earn Lava Chests with guaranteed Lava World Characters.

After the Sneak Peek week, the Lava World will be moved to the end of the World Journey. If you reach Squad League before the event ends, check out the shop for a reward!

LAVA WORLD CHARACTERS

ARCHER

Archers charge and fire Arrow Volleys together. More Archers means more volleys!

  • Rarity: Common

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Shoots an Arrow Volley after 12 Archer attacks

    • Classic: Fusion Archers shoot an extra Arrow Volley

    • Super: Attacks much faster

    • Ultra: Shoots bigger and stronger Arrow Volleys

MINER

Uses Turbo to Burrow underground and avoid damage. Pop up with an area attack or an evolved Eruption attack that stuns!

  • Rarity: Rare

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Burrows then attacks after using enough Turbo

    • Classic: Can Burrow longer to charge an Eruption attack

    • Super: Heals steadily while Burrowing

    • Ultra: Eruption becomes bigger and more powerful

LEON

Gives Invisibility Spells that let you sneak around players and hide amongst Monsters.

  • Rarity: Epic

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Gives an Invisibility Spell

      • Invisibility Spell: Become invisible and sneak around enemies when not fighting

    • Classic: Increases movement speed while Invisible

    • Super: Gives another Invisibility Spell after attacking 25 times

    • Ultra: Move even faster while Invisible

LAVA WORLD BATTLE MODS

  • Crystal Forest: The Map is overgrown with Magic Trees!

  • Timeout: Squads get busted if their Clock hits zero!

  • Hatchling Herder: Giant Hatchlings can be captured for Gems!

A new Volcano Gem Mine also replaces the regular Gem Mine in Lava World, shooting Boulders that explode into Gems!

SKINS AND EMOTES üëï

We're vastly expanding the selection of Skins in the game, and introducing a new way to buy them: Style Tickets!

Style Tickets buy Skins and Emotes found in the new Cosmetics tab in the Shop. Find Style Tickets from Rewards and Shop Deals. Everyone can also claim 600 Free Style Tickets from the Shop for a limited time. Don't forget to get yours!

Also, keep an eye out for new Super Rare Skins that come with an exclusive Emote, and even more Skins coming in future Gem Pass Seasons. Check out the full list of upcoming Skins at the bottom of the page.

In addition, you can now set up to 6 Action Emotes in your Player Profile that will automatically show when things happen, like busting a Squad or coming in 1st Place.

GEM PASS üíé

IN SEPTEMBER:

  • Monster Madness: Unlock the Spooky Pup Rider Skin in the Super Pass

The Pi√±ata Bank has also replaced the MEGA Bank at the end of the Gem Pass, and can give a variety of Rewards, from Characters to resources and even Skins!

GAMEPLAY UPDATES ‚ú®

We‚Äôve reached the conclusion to remove MEGAs, Rerolls, and Key consumables.

After the update, players with any of these items will receive Skins and Coins, instead, when opening the game for the first time. Some features, such as Lucky Finds and the ability to refresh a chest, will remain, but tweaked.

Why? After closely assessing Battle consumables, we found there wasn‚Äôt a balance for MEGAs that would be satisfying and impactful for all players. In addition, Key and Rerolls showed very low usage rates, indicating that they weren‚Äôt well integrated into the game experience.

The team is committed to making sure Squad Busters gameplay is always improving. This means changing things that don‚Äôt work, and moving forward with the things that do!

What happens to removed MEGAs?

  • MEGAs will be converted to equippable Character Skins

  • All players who have unlocked MEGAs will get those Skins for free

  • Players will receive 1000 Coins for every unused MEGA

What happens to removed Keys and Rerolls?

  • Players will also receive Coins for unused Keys and Reroll consumables:

    • Normal Key: 500 Coins

    • Epic Key: 800 Coins

    • Fusion Key: 1500

    • Reroll: 300 Coins

What does this mean for the gameplay?

  • The Battle Bag has been removed

  • Instead of Rerolls, Chests have a ‚ÄúRefresh‚Äù button that can refresh a Chest‚Äôs contents up to 3 times per Battle

  • The Lucky Find comeback mechanic is staying, but gives a random Fusion from your lineup instead of a MEGA, and can happen more often

BALANCE CHANGES üîÉ

Battles are best when you have options, so the big theme for this balancing round is increased Battle fluidity. This means big increases to Turbo and more ability to react to challenging Battle situations. This also means fewer harsh and slogging beatdowns that have little opportunity for tactical turnaround.

Turbo and Other Gameplay üïπÔ∏è

  • Turbo recharges faster and with less delay, to make passive moments more regenerative

  • Blue Boxes contain 1 additional Turbo boot, to make it easier to stock up Turbo early

  • Squads instantly recharge some Turbo when losing a Character that came from a Chest, to allow more tactical options as Squad fights escalate

  • Regular Gem Mines drop substantially more Gems, to increase their relevance and reward

  • Rage and Super Rage Spells have shorter duration and less effect, to bring them more in line with the balance of other Spells

  • Freeze Spells and other minor damage sources no longer cause Monsters to drop loot on hit (Loot Goblin, Pi√±ata, etc.), to help keep Battles running smoothly

Characters and Monsters üëæ

  • Fusion Rebalancing:

    • All Characters have substantially improved Health when not Fused, to make them less vulnerable and quick to lose

    • The Fusion Health buff has been reduced, to keep Fusion Health roughly similar to before

    • Rare and Epic Fusions have slightly reduced damage scaling, to make it consistent with Commons and easier to balance

  • Chicken‚Äôs Hatchlings no longer lose Health over time, as they are already easy to lose

  • Hog Rider Classic and Super Turbo buffs have been reduced, to balance with other Turbo changes

    • Most of the reduction only applies when stacking multiple Hog Riders

  • Bea‚Äôs Bee damage is increased

  • Nita now stands in the back of the Squad, to protect herself better as a ranged unit

  • Nita‚Äôs Bear respawns faster, Ultra Nita‚Äôs Bear respawns much faster

  • Mavis‚Äô Carrots give less loot when destroyed by Bomb Spells, to be consistent with Greg Trees also giving less loot when bombed

  • Ice Wizard attack has been rebalanced

    • Ice Fan does less damage to the first targets hit, but more damage to targets behind, to emphasize the penetration

    • Fusion normal attack has had its damage scaling fixed, and does more damage

  • Yetimite loot is improved, to make them more worth busting

  • Mech attack trigger range is reduced, to make it a more effective Monster Pet

Battle Mods ‚öîÔ∏è

  • Super Gem Mine drops Gems more often, and drops many more Gems from time to time

  • Pinata Party has Blue Boxes like other mods, guaranteeing some Turbo

  • Some Mods that greatly change Chest opening are now less likely to appear:

    • Angry Vines

    • Doppelgangers

    • Epic Overload

    • Double Trouble

    • 1-Coin Chests

  • Some Mods have been removed, and their pages removed from the Achievements Book

    • MEGA Start

    • Baby Battle

Other improvements and fixes üîé

  • Improved Chest Multipliers are replacing Chest Doublers

    • Chest Multipliers can come in 2x, 3x and 4x varieties

    • They are consumed per Battle, instead of with a time limit

    • They can be enabled or disabled before playing the next Battle

  • The Battle leaderboard on the left hand of the screen is now relative to the players position, to make it easier to see who is next ahead and behind

  • In Replays and Spectating, the contents of Chests opened are now shown

  • Maxed out Characters from Reward Chests are now always converted to Portal Energy instead of XP

  • Fixed a bug that could sometimes activate the Spell joystick when pressing Turbo

  • Training rooms spawn more varieties of Bosses more often, and also contain a Blue Box

UPCOMING SKINS üëó

Rare Skins

Available for Style Tickets in the Shop:

  • Tanuki Nita (New!)

  • Stag Bea-tle (New!)

  • Kyudo Bo (New!)

  • Ninja Goblin

Coming as special Shop offers:

  • Team Tuff Mavis (New!)

item.title: SET UP AUTO EMOTES AND GET REWARDS!
item.description:
Auto Emotes is a new feature that allows you to assign Emotes to specific actions so they trigger automatically while you play.

Simply go to the Plaza, tap on your profile, and assign an emote to each slot! There‚Äôs a step-by-step tutorial at the end of this page if you need it.

Now, what about the rewards?

To celebrate the new Auto Emote feature, we‚Äôre tracking every single emote used in battle. The more Emotes used, the more rewards everyone will earn! Every emote counts towards the total progress, and here are the rewards, which will become available as soon as we hit each milestone:

  • 10 Million Emotes: 1 Random Emote

  • 25 Million Emotes: 300 Style Tickets

  • 50 Million Emotes: 50 Baby Colts

  • 100 Million Emotes: Retro Colt Skin

  • 150 Million Emotes: 5 Random Emotes

You can still use manual Emotes in battles, but we recommend setting up the Auto Emotes and letting the game do it for you while you‚Äôre busy busting monsters and grabbing gems!

How to set up Auto Emotes

Go to your Plaza and tap on your avatar located in the top left corner:

Once your Player Profile is open, scroll to the Emote Deck. Here, you can set up your manual Emotes, which you can trigger in battle anytime by pressing the speech bubble next to the move controls.

Keep scrolling to find Action Emotes:

Tap on each action (e.g., Bust Squad, Bust Boss, etc.) and select the emote you want to trigger on each occasion.

Now you‚Äôre all set to show off your Emotes and earn rewards!

item.title: Squad UPdate: Transformers, Star Chests, and more!
Transformers Update: Patch Notes!
item.description:
UPDATED DETAILS (Last edit: 17/09) About Portal Energy:

  • There's no cap on Portal Energy earned from Battles anymore, except for Squad League.

  • Squad League has a daily portal energy limit of 2000 from Battle rewards (equivalent to 10 wins)

    • Additionally you can get the daily bonus of 1000 and any portal energy from the Achievement Book

    • NOTE! There's a known bug when entering Squad League: The limit system doesn't refresh so players can still continue playing without any limit until the day ends. This will be fixed in the next update.

About the Robot Skins

  • Robot Chicken, Medic, Barbarian, and Archer Queen will arrive in the shop on September 30

    • Robot Medic, Barbarian, and Archer Queen will become available for Style Tickets later on.

    • Robot Chicken is a Super Rare skin and will return to the shop periodically as an IAP.

SQUAD UP & ROLL OUT!

Portals have made contact with the world of Cybertron! Squad Busters‚Äô first cross-promo event is here, along with the first Ultimate Evolutions, and a brand new way to unlock them: Star Chests!

SQUAD BUSTERS X TRANSFORMERS EVENT

Don‚Äôt miss your chance to permanently unlock Optimus Prime and Elita-1 during the 2-week long Squad Busters x Transformers Event. If you‚Äôve reached Desert World, collect Energon in Battles to open Transformers Chests and unlock these awesome Autobots.

After the event, Optimus Prime and Elita-1 will appear in the Shop from time to time, , and will continue to appear in Character lineups.

OPTIMUS PRIME

This hero from Cybertron comes with boosted size and immense Health. Unlock his abilities to protect your Squad while charging into danger!

  • Rarity: Epic

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Giant defender as big as a Fusion

    • Classic: Attacks with his Energon Axe after taking damage

    • Super: Heals the Squad when taking damage

Play during Week 1 of the Event to unlock Optimus Prime in Baby, Classic and Super Evolutions.

ELITA-1

This loyal and fearless commander packs boosted size and firepower. Unlock her abilities to harness Turbo and attack with ferocious laser blasts!

  • Rarity: Epic

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Giant ranged fighter as big as a Fusion

    • Classic: Attacks at time-bending speed when using Turbo

    • Super: Turbo lasts much longer while attacking

Play during Week 2 of the Event to unlock Elita-1 in Baby, Classic and Super Evolutions.

Special Event Battle Mod: UNICRON ATTACKS

Optimus Prime and Elita-1 haven‚Äôt arrived alone. During the event, Battles are frequently taken over by the galactic mega-nemesis Unicron and his relentless Megatron Tank reconstructions.

In the event-exclusive Unicron Attacks Battle Mod, Unicron arrives as an unstoppable planet that smashes the Gem Mine to pieces, then assaults Squads and Monsters alike with reconstructed Megatron Tanks. Fight back after he converts into a gargantuan robot form and collect huge amounts of Energon by helping to bust him back to Cybertron!

SKINS & EMOTES üëï

4 new Skins are arriving in the Shop, ready to join the Autobots in Battle:

  • Super Rare Skin: Robot Chicken

    • Includes the exclusive Robot Chicken Emote

  • Rare Skins:

    • Robot Barbarian

    • Robot Archer Queen

    • Robot Medic

Also keep an eye out for the following Skins coming in October, which will be released along with the Graveyard Shift Gem Pass:

  • Werewolf Colt

  • Undead Barbarian King

  • Opera Wizard

  • Pam-Buster

  • Werewolf Heavy

STAR CHESTS & STAR TOKENS

Get more out of every Battle and unlock new Characters and Evolutions faster with our most valuable Chests ever: Star Chests!

Star Chests give only Super, Ultra, or Ultimate Characters, or unlock new Characters, and guarantee an Ultra every 10 Chests. Open one by collecting enough Star Tokens, which can be earned by Evolving Characters, claimed as Rewards, or purchased with Coins.

Celebrate this new feature with us and claim 10 FREE Star Chests, including one guaranteed Ultra Character, available only for a limited time! The first few Star Chests will also cost less Star Tokens for all players. Look out for more Star Chest offers in the Shop as well!

Star Chests have the following drop chances:

  • Unlock new Character: 40.00%

  • Super Character: 58.00%

  • Ultra Character: 1.90%

  • Ultimate Character: 0.10%

If no new Characters are available, Star Chests will only drop Super, Ultra or Ultimate Characters:

  • Super Character: 96.67%

  • Ultra Character: 3.17%

  • Ultimate Character: 0.17%

If the next Star Chest is a guaranteed Ultra or better, the drop chances are:

  • Ultra Character: 95.00%

  • Ultimate Character: 5.00%

Additional details:

  • Evolving Characters no longer gives Portal Energy, but the amount of Portal Energy earned per Battle has been greatly increased, especially when placing at the top!

  • Players can earn a daily First Win Bonus of Portal Energy by placing in the Top 5

  • Star Chests can only unlock new Characters that are available from World Journey progress

  • Star Chests do not drop maxed out Characters

  • For now, Star Chests cannot be opened and Star Tokens are saved if all Characters are maxed out

  • Maxed out Characters from normal Reward Chests give Star Tokens instead of Portal Energy

ULTIMATE EVOLUTIONS ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

12 Characters can now Evolve to their Ultimate form, unlocking their most powerful abilities and most fantastic default Skins!

  • Barbarian: Joins the Squad with a Baby Elite Barbarian

  • Goblin: Increases Fusion Goblin's stash to 30 Coins

  • Greg: Trees drop tons of loot

  • Colt: Bullet Storm charges when attacking Squads

  • Chicken: Spawns many more Hatchlings

  • Bo: Drops Mines more often and Mines last longer

  • Medic: Passive heal gets much stronger and faster

  • Hog Rider: Turbo increases attack speed even more

  • Dynamike: Gives a Barrel Bomb spell

  • Witch: Skeletons move and attack faster when nearby

  • Barbarian King: Attacks with his Iron Fist more often

  • Archer Queen: Attacks with exploding arrows more often

BALANCE CHANGES üìù

The biggest balancing changes this update come from Green World characters and their new Ultimate Evolutions. However, we‚Äôve also included several other focused feature improvements based on player feedback, including several reworks to Lava World content.

World Roster Changes

To increase gameplay variety in the early Worlds, we‚Äôve adjusted what unlocks in the following Worlds:¬†

  • Green World

    • Bo (was Desert World)

    • Battle Mod: 1-Coin Chests (was Ice World)

  • Desert World

    • El Primo (was Green World)

    • Penny (was Beach World)

    • Mortis (was Royal World)

  • Royal World

    • Battle Healer (was Desert World)

  • Beach World

    • Nita (was Desert World)

Characters and Monsters üëæ

  • El Primo has increased Health and does Flying Elbow Drop more often, to elevate his status as a Desert World character

  • Medic has improved healing and stronger Heal Packs, to keep up with recent Health buffs

  • Dynamike attacks faster, and dynamite travels through the air faster, to improve effectiveness in prolonged attacks

  • Super Bandit drops more Gems

  • Leon‚Äôs Invisibility Spell has been reworked to be easier to use and more readable

  • Squads do not lose Invisibility if getting too close to an opponent, so it is easier to maintain Invisibility around other Squads

  • Squads only go partially (not fully) Invisible, to be easier to examine by opponents

  • Squads only become visible when attacking or taking damage, making it easier to reactivate and clearer to counterplay

Battle Mods ‚öîÔ∏è

  • Crystal Forest

    • Hero Greg chops Trees faster, for snappier action

    • More Crystal Trees spawn, and spawn more often, to keep action up

  • Timeout

    • Timer no longer speeds up during Final Stretch, to be easier to follow

    • Timer has less max time and Clock pickups are worth less time as the Battle progresses, to keep the tension up

    • To give more recharge options, Clocks will also now drop from Glimmers, Trees, Carrots and other sources, and bigger Monsters have better Clock drops

    • Less Clocks spawn directly on the Map before the Final Stretch

  • Hatchling Herder

    • 3 Giant Hatchlings can now Fuse, gaining 3x Health and Gem value, to make capturing them earlier more worthwhile and harder to lose

    • Giant Hatchling Gem value is reduced before it is Fused, to emphasize their Fusion

    • Many more Giant Hatchlings spawn throughout the Battle, to keep tails long and satisfying

Gameplay Updates üïπÔ∏è

  • Lucky Finds can now be Refreshed, to give more strategic options

  • When picked from a Lucky Find, some Characters drop more items:

    • Goblin drops more Coins

    • Chicken drops more Turbo Boots

    • Bandit drops Gems

    • Penny drops Treasure Maps

    • Characters that drop a Spell drop an extra Spell

  • Turbo recharges instantly instead of after a short delay, so you can tap it all you like without penalty

  • Ice Skeletons always drop 1 Coin when their Ice armor is shattered, to make Ice World starts faster

  • All Trees, Carrots, Hives, Tanks and Chests respawn at 2 minutes, and the Final Stretch

Other Improvements and Fixes üîé

  • Action Emotes shown in Battle results play with their animations looping

  • Targeting precision has been improved, making it less likely to swap repeatedly between nearby targets

  • Leaderboard entries now show Win Streaks when they update

  • Several improvements to network and device performance

Spooky Update Patch Notes!
item.description:
SPOOKY WORLD IS HERE! üëª

‚ÄòTis the season to be Spooky, and a new world full of tricks and treats is ready for action! Spooky World comes with three popular Brawlers, two new Battle Mods, and new plaza decorations.

Play during the Spooky World Sneak Peek week to try Spooky World and start unlocking new Characters!

If you‚Äôve reached Desert World, collect Pumpkins in Battles and earn Spooky Chests with guaranteed Spooky World Characters üéÉ

After the Sneak Peek week, Spooky World will be moved to the end of the World Journey.

SPOOKY WORLD CHARACTERS:

POCO

Poco and his guitar can heal your Squad while battling enemies.

  • Rarity: Common

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Heals the Squad after busting a foe

    • Classic: Plays a Power Chord attack after 7 attacks

    • Ultra: Plays Power Chords much more often

Poco-Lantern will only be available through the Spooky World release event, and will stay exclusive for a year.

FRANK

Frank is tough as nails and can shock entire groups with his hammer.

  • Rarity: Rare

  • Evolutions:

    • Super: Charges up more damage after taking damage

    • Ultra: Slams a Super Shockwave when fully charged

COLONEL RUFFS

Ruffs upgrades your Squad with Fusions, and can even help you get more Lucky Finds.

  • Rarity: Epic

  • Evolutions:

    • Baby: Upgrades a Squad member into a Fusion

    • Classic: Increases the Health of your Fusions

    • Super: Guarantees a Lucky Find after opening 6 Chests

    • Ultra: Increases the Damage of your Fusions

Spooky World Mods

LOOT MACHINES

Vending machines with big prizes are popping up on Chest platforms! Loot Machines offer valuable prizes for Coins, but don't get too greedy and forget to build your Squad. Loot Machines cost more Coins and contain better prizes as the Battle goes on, so spend wisely!

MEGABOSS SHOWDOWN¬†

Prepare for absolute chaos as a Mega-sized Skeleton King and Zombie Kaiju have an epic showdown in the center of the Map! Brave Squads can snatch up the many Gems dropped by their Battle, but beware getting caught in the crossfire.

GEM PASS & SKINS üëï

Keep an eye out for the following Skins coming alongside November‚Äôs Cyber Squad Gem Pass:

  • Nemesis Max + Emote (Super Gem Pass)

  • Solarpunk Barbarian (Event - FREE!)

  • Solarpunk Heavy (Gem Pass - FREE!)

  • Solarpunk Tank (Available for Style Tickets - Nov 1st)

We're also exploring how future Gem Pass seasons will work. More news will be coming soon!

BALANCE CHANGES üìù

This balancing update is mainly focused on bug fixes and quality of life improvements as we prepare for bigger updates, including new ways to play Squad Busters. We‚Äôve also made lots of performance optimizations, especially on Android!

CHARACTERS AND MONSTERS üëæ

  • Classic El Primo starts with his Flying Elbow Drop fully charged, to be a better starting pick

  • Medic has slightly more Health, to help boost relevancy

  • Ultra Goblin drops more Coins to be more worth the upgrade

  • Ultimate Dynamike‚Äôs Barrel Bomb Spell can blow up Trees and Carrots like normal Bomb Spells

  • Bea and Tank show indicators that point to missing pickups

  • Leon has bugs fixed with his Invisibility Spell

    • Dealing damage with Cannons and other things outside the Squad no longer deactivates Invisibility

    • Active Invisibility is semi-transparent instead of fully transparent

    • Deactivated Invisibility is opaque instead of semi-transparent

  • Fusion Pam again builds a larger and more powerful Fusion Healing Station

  • Fusion Bandit drops a portion of additional Gems, to better reward Fusion

  • Fusion Penny drops an additional Treasure Map, to better reward Fusion

  • Kaiju, Rainmaker and Lava Hound respawn faster

  • Stronger small Monsters (Dart Goblin, Bomber, Rifleman, etc.) drop more Coins

  • Minions drop less Coins

  • XP rewards are increased from certain Battle Mod specific Monsters

BATTLE MODS ‚öîÔ∏è

  • Crystal Forest

    • Crystal Trees can be destroyed by Bomb and Barrel Bomb Spells, because it‚Äôs fun

    • Crystal Trees destroyed by Bombs drop reduced Loot, similar to normal Trees

  • Doppegangers

    • Maximum simultaneous drops per Character type is again limited to 3 Fusion‚Äôs worth

      • For example: Jessies give a max of 3 Turret Spells

    • Pennys drop up to 3 Maps, and drops don‚Äôt depend on the amount of non-fused Pennys

    • Bandits drop Gems, and drops don‚Äôt depend on the amount of non-fused Bandits

  • Hatchling Herder

    • Fixed a bug that would make Fusion Giant Hatchlings increase Chest Cost

  • Many Battle Mods have increased chances to be played with a Bonus mod

    • Very high chance: Turbo Overload, Fusion Start, Megaboss Showdown

    • High chance: Gem Overload, Monster Pets, Angry Vines, Spell Overload, Epic Overload, 1-Coin Chests, Timeout

    • Medium chance: Golden Boots, Doppelgangers, Loot Machines

GAMEPLAY UPDATES üïπÔ∏è

  • Lucky Finds are updated with improved balance and functionality

    • Last update gave an unexpectedly large boost to Lucky Find chances, which has been mostly kept, due to popular feedback. This increase is slightly rebalanced:

      • Chances are slightly reduced for higher placements and bigger Squad sizes

      • Chances reduce more steadily as Squads get bigger, making them still possible, but less certain at larger Squad sizes

      • Chances double during the Final Stretch, to help comeback more

      • Lucky Finds can now appear until the end of the battle

    • Lucky Finds can again be refused via a "Normal Chest" button

  • Big loot drops are more concentrated near their center, to reward the closest players more

    • All power ups, including Keys, always drop close to the center of the loot drop

  • More Hearts spawn on the Map, more consistently, to make searching for Hearts easier

OTHER IMPROVEMENTS AND FIXES üîé

  • Reward Chest outcomes are improved

    • Classic and Super Characters no longer drop, instead giving more Babies to get Star Tokens from Evolving

    • Chest Taps are more likely to result in increased reward sizes

  • Portal Energy no longer has a daily limit when in the World Journey before Squad league

  • Some Character ability descriptions use more consistent numbering to be less confusing

  • Several improvements to device performance, especially on Android
